特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
In principle, this class will be face-to-face; however, all class materials, tasks, and explanations will be posted in a Google Classroom dedicated to this class.

Depending on enrollment and the evolving COVID-19 situation, course format may include the following:
- Individual, pair, and group discussion based on topics that relate to content
- Sharing of information, including weekly homework assignments, on Google Classroom- Presentation and homework assignments
- All components conducted in English
- As a level 1 course, all English tasks expected to be completed at an intermediate level

第1回:
**The schedule below is an example of what the course will look like. Specific contents will not be decided upon until after a needs analysis is done (during first class) to determine the interests, backgrounds, and needs of enrolled students**

Week 1: Class overview, introductions, ice breakers

In principle, all 14 sessions will be conducted face to face
Needs Analysis Survey: 1 hour
第2回: Week 2: Introduction to culture: what is Japanese culture? Discuss first 220-word journal.

Each class, students will need to submit a journal of at least 220 words based on discussion questions related to the topic.
Journal 1: 1-2 hours
第3回: Week 3: What is etiquette and how does it change depending on the cultural environment? Discuss second 220-word journal.
第4回: Week 4: What is nonverbal communication and how is it the same and different around the world? Discuss third 220-word journal.
第5回: Week 5: What are stereotypes, prejudice, and discrimination? How are they seen in media? Discuss fourth 220-word journal.
第6回: Week 6: How does media (e.g. TV, movies) affect our idea of culture and people? What role does perspective play? Discuss fifth 220-word journal.
第7回: Week 7: Evaluating media through the describe, interpret, evaluate (DIE) activity. Discuss sixth 220-word journal
第8回: Week 8: What is Canadian culture and character? How is it represented in the media and via stereotypes? Discuss seventh 220-word journal.
第9回: Week 9: Japan in the media – Mr. Sparkle and The Simpsons. Discuss ninth 220-word journal.
第10回: Week 10: How does cultural media go viral across borders? Discuss ninth 220-word journal.
第11回: Week 11: Practice research and team presentation on media. Discuss final 220-word journal.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading2: Weekly Journal writing and vocab building, 10 @ 3% each
